title: 2016 *Attempting to Reconnect*
body:
Hello,

I am a usual League player who takes a few breaks and even though i do that my league never breaks or disconnects me. But i have been playing recently to find that in my games every 2-3 minutes i get Attempting to Reconnect on my screen. I have been reported several times because of this mishap. I have tried disabling my IP helper but none of those things work. If you have the same problem please tell me below so that i don't feel like i'm being targeted by riot, and if you have a solution please please tell me below. This started after the new patch but my siblings and friends don't have this problem. If you have the solution to this pain please comment it down below. All help is appreciated.

Thanks ~ Dragon

replies.body:
*Attempting to Reconnect* is usually a sign that your computer is experiencing *packet loss* along your network routing to the server. Before we take an in-depth look at your route, I'd like you to make sure your network settings match what's inside of our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to see this issue after working through that guide.
Hope this helps, posted 2 years ago, it helped myself. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/YTYXWqNl-league-wont-open-after-clicking-launch-may-have-found-a-partial-solutionclue
